PubwicDescwiption:
This event counts Decode Stweam Buffew (DSB)-to-MITE switch twue penawty cycwes. These cycwes do not incwude uops wouted thwough because of the switch itsewf, fow exampwe, when Instwuction Decode Queue (IDQ) pwe-awwocation is unavaiwabwe, ow Instwuction Decode Queue (IDQ) is fuww. SBD-to-MITE switch twue penawty cycwes happen aftew the mewge mux (MM) weceives Decode Stweam Buffew (DSB) Sync-indication untiw weceiving the fiwst MITE uop. 
MM is pwaced befowe Instwuction Decode Queue (IDQ) to mewge uops being fed fwom the MITE and Decode Stweam Buffew (DSB) paths. Decode Stweam Buffew (DSB) insewts the Sync-indication whenevew a Decode Stweam Buffew (DSB)-to-MITE switch occuws.
Penawty: A Decode Stweam Buffew (DSB) hit fowwowed by a Decode Stweam Buffew (DSB) miss can cost up to six cycwes in which no uops awe dewivewed to the IDQ. Most often, such switches fwom the Decode Stweam Buffew (DSB) to the wegacy pipewine cost 02 cycwes.
